Articles.Content:
After the boosters failed to seperate, and it hurtled out of control, will they still be able to make it to a planet? there goal was minimus... but who knows now...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HovyUICxNgs
Your intro was way too long and the video was just a slideshow.

Slideshows on YouTube really bother me. It's not a video.

You could easily use a Tumblr or something instead.
A slideshow with WAY too much useless text. I'm sorry, but this gets a C for effort.
Good luck avoiding the deep space seperation bug! It's gotten me on all my interplanetry trips so far...

Good luck avoiding the deep space seperation bug! It's gotten me on all my interplanetry trips so far...

Don't spam the warp down button. That's the sole cause of it. Just lower your warp slowly.
I was going to comment on not liking slideshows and long intros but others beat me to it..

Sorry. My pc lags VERY bad, so i get 5 fps in recording. HOWEVER

I am currently producing a video, NOT a slideshow, called:

When Rockets Go Bad: Ep1: Booster failure

Basically, its rockets failing/exploding/doing weird stuff, and this episode should be MUCH better than this.
